short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically adjusts the volume based on noise levels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted your device to change its volume automatically? Now it can! 🌟

🔇 Noise Cancelling Mode:

When it's noisy, your volume goes up.
When it's quiet, your volume goes back to normal.
🔊 Awareness Mode:

When you need to hear what's around you, your volume lowers in noisy places.
Quiet? Your volume stays as you set it.
Personalize your experience: 🎛️
Set your preferred minimum and maximum volume levels to create the perfect balance.
Adjust sensitivity as you like.

Here's how to use the extension:
1-Choose your website.
2-Click on 'Support this website.
3-After the website reloads, allow microphone access.
4-You can delete any website you no longer want this extension to support.
